functional_requirements.title: Customer Creation with Credit Assessment
functional_requirements.description: The system shall allow creation of new customer accounts with mandatory credit assessment validation before account approval
business_rules: BR-CUST-001: Credit assessment required - credit score must be >= 700
acceptance_criteria: Customer record is created in DB2_CUSTOMER_MASTER table with all required fields
Credit assessment is performed and validated before account creation
Unique customer ID is generated automatically (UUID format)
Customer data includes: name, address, email, phone, credit score, timestamps

functional_requirements.title: Customer Validation Against Business Rules
functional_requirements.description: The system shall validate customer master data against defined business rules before any updates or transactions are processed
business_rules: BR-CUST-002: Customer ID must be valid UUID format
BR-CUST-003: Email address must be unique across all customers
BR-CUST-004: Credit limit validation based on credit score
acceptance_criteria: Customer ID format is validated (UUID v4)
Email address is validated for format and uniqueness
Address fields are validated (non-empty, valid format)
Credit score is validated (0-850 range)
Validation errors return specific error codes (CUST-001 through CUST-004)

functional_requirements.title: Customer Inquiry by ID
functional_requirements.description: The system shall retrieve comprehensive customer details based on a provided customer identification number
acceptance_criteria: Endpoint accepts customer ID (UUID) as input parameter
Returns complete customer record if found in database
Returns HTTP 404 with error code CUST-001 if customer not found
Response time < 500ms for single customer record retrieval
Response includes all customer fields (name, email, address, phone, credit_score, timestamps)

functional_requirements.title: Customer Update with Audit Trail
functional_requirements.description: The system shall allow updates to customer information while maintaining an audit trail of all changes
business_rules: BR-CUST-005: Updated_at timestamp must be automatically updated on any modification
acceptance_criteria: Accepts partial updates (only modified fields)
Re-validates all business rules after update
Updates updated_at timestamp automatically
Returns updated customer record
Returns HTTP 404 if customer not found
Returns HTTP 400 if validation fails

non_functional_requirements.title: Customer API Response Time
non_functional_requirements.description: The system shall respond to customer API requests within acceptable time limits to ensure good user experience
acceptance_criteria: GET /customers/{id} responds in < 500ms (95th percentile)
POST /customers responds in < 1000ms (95th percentile)
PUT /customers/{id} responds in < 800ms (95th percentile)
No performance degradation under load (100 concurrent users)

non_functional_requirements.title: Customer Data Encryption
non_functional_requirements.description: The system shall encrypt sensitive customer data at rest and in transit to protect personal information
acceptance_criteria: Sensitive fields (email, phone, address) encrypted at rest using AES-256
All API communications use HTTPS/TLS 1.3
Encryption keys stored in secure vault (not hardcoded)
Regular key rotation implemented (every 90 days)

non_functional_requirements.title: Customer Data Validation Accuracy
non_functional_requirements.description: The system shall provide accurate and informative validation error messages to help users correct input errors
acceptance_criteria: Validation errors include field name and specific issue
Error messages are user-friendly (not technical jargon)
Multiple validation errors returned together (not one at a time)
Error codes map to specific validation failures
